welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: This app helps you understand work rights.
welcome.description: We help you know your next steps. We do not give legal advice. We help you plan.
welcome.disclaimer: This is not legal advice. It helps you plan. For legal help, talk to an advisor.

step1.title: What happened?
step1.subtitle: Choose what best describes your situation.

step2.title: When did this happen?
step2.subtitle: This helps us work out time limits.
step2.notSure: I'm not sure of the date
step2.approxHint: If you're not sure, try to remember the month.

step3.title: Have you contacted ACAS?
step3.subtitle: ACAS Early Conciliation is a step before tribunal.
step3.explanation: You must contact ACAS before going to tribunal. It's free.

options.notStarted: No, I have not contacted ACAS

step4.title: Check your details
step4.subtitle: Make sure this is correct.
step4.saved: Your information is saved. Click "See my plan" to view your journey map and deadlines.

journey.title: Your Journey Map
journey.subtitle: These are the steps in a tribunal case.

incident.title: Something happened
incident.description: A problem at work that may break the law.

acas.title: ACAS Early Conciliation
acas.description: You must contact ACAS first. It's free. They try to help you and your employer agree.

et1.title: ET1 claim form
et1.description: This is the form you send to the tribunal.

et3.title: Employer responds (ET3)
et3.description: Your employer writes their side of the story.

caseManagement.title: Case management
caseManagement.description: The tribunal makes orders. They tell you what to do next.

witness.title: Witness statements and bundle
witness.description: You write your story. You collect documents.

hearing.title: Hearing
hearing.description: You go to the tribunal. You tell your story. They make a decision.

checkIn.acasComplete: Have you finished with ACAS? Do you have your certificate?
checkIn.et1Submitted: Have you submitted your ET1 form? Enter your case number to track it.
checkIn.witnessStatement: Have you started writing your witness statement? I can help you.
checkIn.scheduleOfLoss: Do you need help with your schedule of loss?
checkIn.hearingPrep: Are you ready for your hearing? I can explain what to expect.

deadline.title: Deadline Guardian
deadline.subtitle: Time limits are strict. Don't miss them.
deadline.limitLabel: Your time limit may end on
deadline.unknownDate: We need the date to show your time limit.
deadline.findDate: Try to find the exact date. It's very important.
deadline.acasExtension: This deadline includes an extension for ACAS Early Conciliation.
deadline.disclaimer: Check official sites or talk to an advisor if unsure.

nextAction.acasStarted: Keep your ACAS info safe. You may need a certificate code for ET1.

chat.title: Ask a question
chat.disclaimer: I can't give legal advice. I can explain steps and help you organize info.
chat.greeting: Hello! How can I help you today? I can explain the steps or answer questions about your situation.

documents.prepDescription: Create important documents for your case.
documents.exportDescription: Create a text file with all your case information, including documents, dates, and progress.
documents.exportSent: Email client opened with case details
documents.noAdvisorEmail: Please add your legal advisor's email in settings
documents.addAdvisorHint: Add your legal advisor's email in settings to enable sending.

witnessStatement.title: Witness Statement
witnessStatement.description: Your story in your own words

introduction.title: Who you are
introduction.description: Start with your name, job title, and how long you worked there.
introduction.placeholder: I am [your name]. I worked at [company] as a [job title] from [date] to [date].

background.title: Your job
background.description: Describe your role and what you did at work.
background.placeholder: My job was to... I worked with... My manager was...

events.title: What happened
events.description: Explain what happened step by step. Use dates if you can.

impact.title: How it affected you
impact.description: Explain how this made you feel and any harm it caused.
impact.placeholder: This made me feel... I had to... It affected my...

conclusion.title: What you want
conclusion.description: Say what you are asking the tribunal to decide.
conclusion.placeholder: I believe that... I am asking for...

pastLoss.title: Money lost so far
pastLoss.description: Wages, benefits, or expenses you have already lost.

futureLoss.title: Future money loss
futureLoss.description: Wages or benefits you expect to lose in the future.
futureLoss.placeholder: I expect to lose... per week for... weeks.

benefits.title: Lost benefits
benefits.description: Pension, health insurance, or other benefits you lost.

injury.title: Hurt feelings
injury.description: Compensation for how you were treated (injury to feelings).
injury.placeholder: The lower band is £1,000 to £11,000. The middle band is £11,000 to £33,000.

events.title: Important dates
events.description: List each important date and what happened.
events.placeholder:
[Date] - Started work
[Date] - First problem
[Date] - Complained to manager

claims.title: Your claims
claims.description: What laws do you say were broken?
claims.placeholder:
1. Was I unfairly dismissed?
2. Did they discriminate against me because of...?

et1.personalDetails: Prepare your personal details (name, address, phone)
et1.employerDetails: Get your employer's name and address
et1.claimDetails: Write what happened and what you want

et3.received: Wait for employer's response (they have 28 days)
et3.review: Read what they say and note what is wrong

witness.getOthers: Ask other witnesses to write statements
witness.prepareBundle: Put all documents in order (the bundle)
witness.scheduleOfLoss: Calculate what you lost (schedule of loss)

hearing.travel: Plan how to get to the tribunal

reminders.description: We can send you reminders about deadlines.
reminders.consent: I agree to receive reminder emails

reminders.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
reminders.savedLocally: Reminder saved locally. We will sync when the service is available.
